// </auto-generated>

using System;
{{~ for $namespace in namespace_set ~}}
using {{ $namespace }};
{{~ end ~}}

namespace UI.Core
{
    public partial class UIManager
    {
        private void AddInfo(UIType uiType, UILayer layer, Type pageType, string loadPath)
        {
            InfoContainer.AddInfo(new UIInfo((int)uiType, (int)layer, pageType, loadPath));
        }
        
        private void LoadInfos()
        {
            {{~ for $item in info_items ~}}
            AddInfo(UIType.{{ $item.ui_type }}, UILayer.{{ $item.layer }}, typeof({{ $item.page_type }}), "{{ $item.load_path }}");
            {{~ end ~}}
        }
    }
}
